an4.17:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of making prejudiced decisions.
an4.17:1.3: Making decisions prejudiced by favoritism, hostility, stupidity, and cowardice.
an4.17:1.4: These are the four ways of making prejudiced decisions.
an4.17:2.1: If you act against the teaching
an4.17:2.2: out of favoritism, hostility, cowardice, or stupidity,
an4.17:2.4: like the moon in the waning fortnight.”
